alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 11:23AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, northeastern Conway and north central Faulkner Counties through NOON CDT... At 1123 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Claude, or 12 miles southwest of Clinton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Fairbanks... Whipple... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Claude... Choctaw... Woolly Hollow State Park... Cleveland... Bee Branch... Beverage Town... Austin in Conway County... Southside in Van Buren County... Morganton... Scotland... Culpepper... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County
